name: vImage_CGImageFormat
desc: The description of a Core Graphics image.

items.name: init(bitsPerComponent: UInt32, bitsPerPixel: UInt32, colorSpace: Unmanaged<CGColorSpace>!, bitmapInfo: CGBitmapInfo, version: UInt32, decode: UnsafePointer<CGFloat>!, renderingIntent: CGColorRenderingIntent)
items.desc: Creates a Core Graphics image format.

items.name: init?(bitsPerComponent: Int, bitsPerPixel: Int, colorSpace: CGColorSpace, bitmapInfo: CGBitmapInfo, renderingIntent: CGColorRenderingIntent)
items.desc: Creates a Core Graphics image format, with a color space instance and default decode array.

items.name: init?(cgImage: CGImage)
items.desc: Creates a Core Graphics image format of the specified image.

items.name: var bitmapInfo: CGBitmapInfo
items.desc: The component information that describes the color channels.

items.name: var bitsPerComponent: UInt32
items.desc: The number of bits needed to represent one channel of data in one pixel.

items.name: var bitsPerPixel: UInt32
items.desc: The number of bits needed to represent one pixel.

items.name: var colorSpace: Unmanaged<CGColorSpace>!
items.desc: A description of the position of the pixel data in the image, relative to a reference XYZ color space.

items.name: var componentCount: Int
items.desc: The number of channels (color and alpha).

items.name: var decode: UnsafePointer<CGFloat>!
items.desc: The decode array for the image.

items.name: var renderingIntent: CGColorRenderingIntent
items.desc: A rendering intent constant that specifies how Core Graphics should handle colors that aren’t located within the destination color space gamut.
